prompt:
Task: For each ingredient, choose the best Woolworths SKU (from candidates) and suggest how many retail packs are needed.
        Use servings + archetype context to keep quantities realistic. If no candidate fits, set selected_product_id to null and explain in package_notes.
        Do NOT rewrite the instructions or mention retailer names in the method; only provide product matches.

        Archetype snapshot:
        ```json
        {

    ],

      "Mediterranean"
    ],
    "CuisineOpenness": [

    ],
    "PrepTime": [
      "15to30"
    ],
    "Complexity": [
      "Simple"
    ],
    "HeatSpice": [
      "Mild"
    ],
    "Audience": [
      "Family"
    ],
    "BudgetLevel": [
      "Affordable"
    ],
    "EthicsReligious": [],
    "Allergens": []
  }
}
        ```

        Meal draft:
        ```json
        {
  "name": "Sheet-Pan Lemon Oregano Chicken with Zucchini, Peppers & Feta",
  "description": "A quick, low-carb Mediterranean-style sheet-pan dinner with juicy chicken and roasted vegetables, finished with olives and feta. Mild, family-friendly flavors in under 30 minutes.",
  "servings": "Serves 4",
  "prep_steps": [
    "Preheat oven to 220°C (425°F) and place a rack in the middle; lightly oil a sheet pan.",
    "Cut chicken breast into large bite-size pieces.",
    "Slice zucchini into half-moons.",
    "Slice bell peppers into strips.",
    "Halve cherry tomatoes.",
    "Mince garlic.",
    "Zest and juice the lemon.",
    "In a large bowl, combine olive oil, lemon zest, lemon juice, garlic, oregano, salt, and black pepper; add chicken and vegetables and toss to coat."
  ],
  "cook_steps": [
    "Spread the chicken and vegetables in a single layer on the sheet pan.",
    "Roast for 15–18 minutes, stirring once halfway, until chicken is cooked through and vegetables are tender with light browning.",
    "Scatter olives and crumbled feta over the pan; return to the oven for 2 minutes to warm through.",
    "Taste and adjust salt and black pepper if needed; serve hot."
  ],
  "ingredients": [
    {
      "core_item_name": "chicken breast",
      "quantity": "800 g",
      "preparation": "cut into large bite-size pieces"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "zucchini",
      "quantity": "2 medium",
      "preparation": "sliced into half-moons"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "bell peppers",
      "quantity": "2 medium",
      "preparation": "sliced into strips"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "cherry tomatoes",
      "quantity": "1 heaped cup",
      "preparation": "halved"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "garlic",
      "quantity": "2 cloves",
      "preparation": "minced"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "lemon",
      "quantity": "1",
      "preparation": "zested and juiced"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "olive oil",
      "quantity": "3 tablespoons"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "oregano",
      "quantity": "1 teaspoon"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "salt",
      "quantity": "1 teaspoon"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "black pepper",
      "quantity": "1/2 teaspoon"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "olives",
      "quantity": "1/2 cup",
      "preparation": "pitted, roughly chopped"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "feta",
      "quantity": "100 g",
      "preparation": "crumbled"
    }
  ],
  "meal_tags": {
    "Diet": [
      "LowCarb"
    ],
    "Cuisine": [
      "Mediterranean",
      "ModernAmerican"
    ],
    "PrepTime": [
      "15to30"
    ],
    "Complexity": [
      "Simple"
    ],
    "HeatSpice": [
      "Mild"
    ],
    "Allergens": [
      "Dairy"
    ],
    "BudgetLevel": [
      "Affordable"
    ],
    "Audience": [
      "Family"
    ],
    "CuisineOpenness": [
      "FamiliarClassics"
    ],
    "Equipment": [
      "Oven"
    ]
  }
}
        ```
